docs.snippet: A man and woman who killed two Las Vegas police officers in a pizza shop and a shopper in a Wal-Mart before they died in a store shootout earlier this month were heavily armed and carried ammunition including armor-piercing bullets, Clark County S...
docs.lead_paragraph: A man and woman who killed two Las Vegas police officers in a pizza shop and a shopper in a Wal-Mart before they died in a store shootout earlier this month were heavily armed and carried ammunition including armor-piercing bullets, Clark County Sheriff Doug Gillespie said Monday.

headline.main: Police: Cop Killers Heavily Armed, Wore Diapers
headline.print_headline: Police: Cop Killers Heavily Armed, Wore Diapers
